name: DFS（搜索）
scenarios: Enumerating all possible states/solutions (e.g., permutations, combinations, partitions, pathfinding in implicit graphs), backtracking problems, constraint satisfaction problems (CSPs), puzzles (N-Queens, Sudoku)
extensions: Iterative Deepening DFS (IDDFS), Depth-Limited Search, Backtracking with pruning, Memoization (DFS with DP), Meet-in-the-Middle
